rooms.description: Spacious entrance with Mediterranean style decor, integrated lighting and reception area
Open-concept living room with comfortable seating, Mediterranean accents, and large windows for natural light.
Modern dining area connected to the kitchen, with Vastu optimized layout for family gatherings.
Luxury master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed per Vastu for peace and relaxation.
Guest room featuring modern amenities and Mediterranean style decor.
Well-lit study/library area with built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and dedicated reading space.
Separate living room and kitchenette for servants, ensuring privacy and ease of access.
Multipurpose utility space that can be adapted for home office or storage needs.

openings.description: Large door with a glass panel following Mediterranean design, promoting welcoming light and ventilation.
Energy-efficient windows ensuring natural light penetration and fresh air circulation.

openings.location: Between Master Bedroom and Ensuite Bathroom
openings.description: Seamless transition door with sound insulation, following privacy norms.
